summary: Tested Indonesian translations for staff-facing components. Language toggle works correctly (EN/ID). Most staff pages show proper Indonesian translations. Found one component (Leaderboard.js) with incomplete translations - hardcoded English text not using t() function.

ui_bugs.issue: Hardcoded English text not using translation system - 'Staff Leaderboard', 'Rankings', 'Monthly OMSET Target', 'Daily NDP Target', 'Daily RDP Target', 'This Month', 'All Time', 'days worked', 'Today NDP/RDP', 'Avg Daily NDP', 'Avg Daily RDP', 'Edit Targets', 'Loading leaderboard...', 'No data available'

passed_tests: Frontend: Staff login works with staff@crm.com / staff123
Frontend: Language toggle button (data-testid='language-toggle') works correctly
Frontend: Language toggle switches between EN and ID
Frontend: Sidebar navigation items translated to Indonesian when language is ID
Frontend: OMSET CRM page displays Indonesian translations (Tambah Data, Ekspor CSV, Produk, Tanggal, Total Pelanggan, NDP, RDP, etc.)
Frontend: Pelanggan Saya (My Assigned Customers) page displays Indonesian translations (Pelanggan yang Ditugaskan, Semua Produk, Ada, Ceklis 1, Tidak, Respond Ya, Respond Tidak)
Frontend: DB Bonanza page displays Indonesian translations (Cari data, Semua Produk, data ditugaskan, Ditugaskan)
Frontend: Member WD CRM page displays Indonesian translations (Cari data, Semua Produk, data ditugaskan, Ditugaskan)
Frontend: Off Day / Sakit page displays Indonesian translations (Ajukan cuti atau sakit, Permintaan Baru, Tahun, Bulan, Saldo Cuti, jam, Jam Terpakai, Disetujui, Permintaan Cuti Saya)

Frontend: Pengingat Follow-up page displays Indonesian translations (Pelanggan yang respond Ya tapi belum depo, Total Tertunda, Kritis, Tinggi, Sedang, Sudah Depo, hari lalu, Merespon, WA Ada, Tidak Ada)
Frontend: StaffProgress.js component uses translation system correctly
Frontend: StaffOmsetCRM.js component uses translation system correctly
Frontend: MyAssignedRecords.js component uses translation system correctly
Frontend: StaffDBBonanza.js component uses translation system correctly
Frontend: StaffMemberWDCRM.js component uses translation system correctly
Frontend: StaffLeaveRequest.js component uses translation system correctly
Frontend: StaffFollowups.js component uses translation system correctly
action_items: Update Leaderboard.js to use t() function for all hardcoded English strings - replace 'Staff Leaderboard' with t('leaderboard.title'), 'This Month' with t('common.thisMonth'), 'All Time' with t('common.allTime'), 'days worked' with t('staff.daysWorked'), etc.
critical_code_review_comments: Leaderboard.js imports useLanguage but has many hardcoded English strings not using t() function
All other staff components (StaffOmsetCRM, MyAssignedRecords, StaffDBBonanza, StaffMemberWDCRM, StaffLeaveRequest, StaffProgress, StaffFollowups) correctly use the translation system
context_for_next_testing_agent: Indonesian translations tested for staff panel. Language toggle (data-testid='language-toggle') works correctly. Most staff pages properly translated. Leaderboard.js component needs translation updates - it has hardcoded English text. The translation files (id.js and en.js) are comprehensive and include all necessary keys.
